metadata.title: CVE-2020-8185 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in Rails <6.0.3.2 that allowed anuntrusted user to run any pending migrations on a Rails app running inproduction.

criterions.comment: rails: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
